newsitem.title: SPAIN: Lisbon air cargo up 9 pct in April, up 11.6 pct in.
newsitem.headline: Lisbon air cargo up 9 pct in April, up 11.6 pct in.

text.p: Cargo traffic at Lisbon airport rose nine percent in April to 8,870 tonnes, the Portuguese airports authority ANA said. This takes the total in the first four months of the year to 34,277 tonnes, an 11.6 percent increase on the same period 1996.
Passenger numbers at Lisbon were 3.9 percent higher than the same month a year earlier at 562,285.
The number of aircraft movements fell 1.3 percent in the month to 6,608.

Cargo business at Porto, the country's second biggest air freight airport, was up 20.1 percent in April at 2,336 tonnes, putting its accumulated total at 10,013 tonnes, 26.6 percent ahead of last year. --Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542-7706 Fax+5017
